summary:
This mod provides lore-friendly high-resolution textures and improved meshes for most of the rugs in Skyrim.
All textures were carefully overhauled to maintain the original style.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1399675469.jpg[/img]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1399675545.jpg[/img]

[center][youtube]rLtVh_1Bwfw[/youtube]

Thanks to [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton?feature=watch]hodilton[/url] for making this comparison video.

[youtube]CKNNsM-gwI0[/youtube]
Thanks to [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/BDMods/videos?view=0]BDMods[/url] for their video footage.[/center]

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1400932919.jpg[/img]

This mod provides lore-friendly high-resolution textures and improved meshes for most of the rugs in Skyrim.
All textures were carefully overhauled to maintain the original style. In version 1.4 some vanilla styles are replaced with new high resolution textures.

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1400933152.jpg[/img]

[list]
1.5[*] Added new high resolution texture for the Sovngarde rugs
[*] Incorporated the Jorrvaskr table fix
[*] Changed the design of the Jorrvaskr rug
[*] Improved the rug meshes, that were used during the burial ceremony of Kodlak Whitemane
[/list]
[list]
1.4 [*] Added new high resolution variants for several vanilla styled rugs
[*] Improved uv mapping and vertex shading of many rug meshes
[*] Further improved and optimized many textures and normal maps
[*] Added upperclasscustom table and cloth mesh from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]SMIM[/url] to be compatible with my improved banner texture (SMIM is not required)
1.3[*] Changed the design of common rug01 and rug04 to a more celtic and lore friendly version
[*] Improved the appearance and visual quality of the fringes
[*] Added optional clean version
1.2[*] Added new textures to the windhelm runner, round rugs and the whiterun rug that can also be found in Helgen Keep (all 1024 x 1024)
[*] Changed the texture of the rug fringes to a more appropriate style
[*] Corrected some rug meshes and fixed several UV errors
1.1[*] Added new textures to the rugs in Dragonsreach (1024 x 1024) and Jorrvaskr (1024 x 2048)
[*] Added new texture to the rugs in Whiterun's taverns (1024 x 1024)
1.0 - Initial release:[*] Added new textures (1024x2048) to 8 common rugs. Most of them can be found in the Bards College and the Blue Palace in Solitude.
[/list]

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1400933021.jpg[/img]

Just unzip the archive and extract the files into your Skyrim/Data directory.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1400933057.jpg[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14227]Ruins Clutter Improved[/url] adds new high-res textures to common clutter objects in nordic ruins.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83068?]Dawnguard Fortress Improved[/url] adds new high-res textures and improved meshes to the Dawnguard Fortress.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30631]The Beauty of Skyrim - Caves and Mines[/url] adds new high resolution textures to the caves and mines of Skyrim.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37496]The Beauty of Skyrim - Dungeons[/url] adds new high resolution textures to the dungeons of Skyrim.

[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2141127-1400933102.jpg[/img]

The following Photoshop brushes were used to create these textures:

- Circular Frames Brushes by visualjenna
- Vector Pack High-Res by Ahmed Galal
- Celtic Vectors from [url=http://www.obsidiandawn.com]www.obsidiandawn.com[/url]

Thank you for providing them as free resource.

I have also used some base textures from [url=http://www.cgtextures.com]www.cgtextures.com[/url] and [url=http://bgfons.com]bgfons.com[/url].

Big thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/283020/?]Brumbek[/url] for his awesome [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655]SMIM[/url] and the permission to use his meshes.

Additional thanks goes to Bethesda and the Skyrim Nexus Community.
author: raiserfx
